data.title: Publishing your Android, Kotlin or Java library to mavenCentral
data.summary: Once you’ve requested your group id and generated all of the signing keys — you want your library to be uploaded as an aar or jar to mavenCentral.
data.author: Niklas Baudy

data.title: All my books in AR
data.summary: I love reading books. I also love to track what I’ve read. Goodreads is a probably world’s largest community of book lovers and I use it for more than 8 years now.
data.author: Andrey Suvorov
